hanzi-su-wiki:
令

Значения

Приказ; командир, начальник; закон, постановление

Мнемоника

Единство бирок 卩, совпадение кусочков бамбука, служивших паролем. Предъявитель официально получал право отдавать приказы. Приказ, начальник, закон.
purpleculture_pinyin:
lìng
to order; to command; an order; warrant; writ; to cause; to make sth happen; virtuous; honorific title; season; government position (old); type of short song or poem
заказать; командовать; Заказ; ордер; приказ; вызывать; чтобы что-то произошло; добродетельный; почетный титул; время года; должность в правительстве (старая); тип короткой песни или стихотворения

líng
see 令狐 ; see 脊令
см. 令狐; см. 脊 令

lǐng
classifier for a ream of paper
классификатор для пачки бумаги
rtega_mnemonic:
令令RS
X		command, order, 'commandant', magistrate, allow, cause
  • one 一 boss using the seal 卩, symbol of authority, in the house 𠆢; con.: seal, freezing, cold relationship = absence of warm dialogue
法 憲 律 則; 揮; 冷 齢 命 鈴 領 零

令令RScommand, order, commandant, magistrate, allow, cause
  • if something 丶 is ordered it must happen now 今
法 憲 律 則; 揮; 冷 齢 命 鈴 領 零
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A person kneeling before a master 人
purpleculture_examples:
命令 [ mìng lìng ]: order; command; Classifiers: 道
司令 [ sī lìng ]: commanding officer
责令 [ zé lìng ]: to order; to enjoin; to charge; to instruct sb to finish sth
下令 [ xià lìng ]: to give an order; to command
司令员 [ sī lìng yuán ]: commander
令狐 [ líng hú ]: old place name (in modern Linyi county 临猗县 , Shanxi); two-character surname Linghu
脊令 [ jí líng ]: variant of 鹡鸰
令狐德棻 [ líng hú dé fēn ]: Linghu Defen (583-666), Tang dynasty historian, compiler of History of Zhou of the Northern dynasties 周书
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 人 [ rén ] man, person; people
heisig_chinese_memo: These are your orders, declares the general while passing out documents at the meeting. As everyone started to leave, the general exclaims "Oh wait! I need to certify these orders!" and went around stamping each paper with his personal chop-seal.
koohiiStory1: (re: dingomick) "These are your orders," declares the general while passing out documents at the meeting. As everyone started to leave, the general exclaims "Oh wait! I need to certify these orders!" and went around stamping each paper with his personal chop-seal.
koohiiStory2: These are your orders, declares the general at the meeting as he stamps them with his chop-seal. (Primitive: chop-seal imaged as a papal ring, the one´s they would press into wax as their official seal. Also a cattle brand.).
jp_example_words:
指令(しれい): orders, instructions, directive
仮令(たとえ): example, even if, if, though, although
命令(めいれい): order, command, decree, directive, (software) instruction
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you know the radical meaning order you know the kanji meaning order as well!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Here's an order: study your radicals.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your orders are to get a ray (れい) gun.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
Imagine an authority figure giving you this order as an official order. Ray guns don't really exist, so you think it's a pretty strange order.
Hint: when you see the orders radical, the reading will often be れい. The mnemonic will likely involve orders to get a ray gun of some kind.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 今 (いま、コン、キン сейчас).
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 卩 (печать)
Ru_trainchinese:

lǐng: (сч.слово) стопка (устар. счетное слово для 500 листов бумаги)
lìng: (графема) время года, сезон; застольная игра; древний чиновничий титул; короткая песня или стих; (уваж.) Ваш; (книжн.) хороший
Kanshudo_mnemonic: an assembly (亼) of seals (卩) makes an order
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: These are your orders, declares the general while passing out documents at the meeting. As everyone started to leave, the general exclaims "Oh wait! I need to certify these orders!" and went around stamping each paper with his personal chop-seal.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jin inscription from "亼" from " Jie ", "亼" is like the upside-down form of " mouth ", and " Jie " is like a kneeling human figure. Quanzi means to open your mouth (亼) to give orders to the kneeling people (Jie), the original meaning is command. "Said Wen": "Ling, issue number. From Qian and Xian." " Ling " and " Ming " are the ancient characters, which are later divided into two characters, see " Ming ".

The Oracle " Ling " is used as a verb to refer to commands. "Compilation" 14295: "This January, the emperor will rain." "Compilation" 20451: "Wang Lingyu (Royal) Fang", refers to the king's order to resist Fang.

Bronze " order " is also used as a verb, referring to commands. Zha Cai Shuai: "Wang Jiang Ling Zha (made) Suai An corpse (Yi) Bai (Bo)", referring to Wang Jiang's order to write Suai to send greetings to Bo Yi. Also used as a noun, referring to commands, Dabao: "The king surrendered to Dabao", referring to the king's command to the Taibao for war. In addition, " Ming " refers to appointment, Chu Ding: "Yu, let the woman (ru) change (赓) Naiqi (ancestor) to test the divination." The whole sentence refers to the divination, appoint you to continue your ancestor in charge of divination. " Ling " also extended from the order to refer to rewards, offering: "Kai Bai (Bo) Ling 氒 (Jue) Chen offers the golden cart", refers to Kai Bo rewarded the courtier's bronze cart named Xian. There is the word "Tian Ling" in the bronze inscriptions, which is the "mandatory of heaven" in the handed down classics, and white [冬戈] 𣪕 Cover: "Huihong Tianling (Ming)" refers to the benevolent and generous destiny (Wang Hui). Since life is bestowed by heaven, the term " order " by best means life and longevity. Song Ding: "Tong Yi (Lu), Yong Ling (Ming)" refers to complete blessing and long life. In addition, the inscription " Ling " can be used as a " bell " to make Zhou Lingyi: "Wang Cheng Zhou Ling (Ling)."

" Ling " in Qin bamboo slips is also used as the original meaning, referring to commands, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. "The Eighteen Kinds of Qin Law" Jian 101: "The person who is dead (fake), and who is dead will also make his disciples and sheren let him (fake)." The full sentence refers to the use of official artifacts, If the borrower dies, the serving disciples or their dead should be ordered to be responsible. Also " Ling " can be used as official name, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. "Closed Diagnosis Style" Jan. 24: "Ling Shi a certain tooth cow, the cow is six years old," which means that Ling Shi was immediately ordered to check the cow's teeth. The cow was six years old.

In the handed down ancient books, " Ling " means envoy and letting go from command, "Guang Ya. Shi Gu Yi: "Ling, Shi Ye." "Warring States Policy. "Zhao Ceyi": "Therefore, you are the lords, do not let you in the aspect." And " order " has a beautiful meaning, "Erya. "Explanation on the Interpretation": "Ling, good also." "Poetry. Daya. "Volume A": "Like Guiruzhang, let the news make Wang." Zheng Xuanjian: "Ling, good."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The full character of the Jiajin inscription means that the upper person will open his mouth (亼) to issue an order to the kneeling person (Jie). The original meaning is an order.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「亼」從「卩」，「亼」象「口」之倒置形，「卩」象跪坐之人形。全字意會張口（亼）向跪坐之下人（卩）發施號令，本義是命令。《說文》：「令，發號也。从亼、卪。」「令」、「命」古本一字，後分化為二字，參見「命」。

　　甲骨文「令」用作動詞，指命令。《合集》14295：「今一月，帝令雨。」《合集》20451：「王令御(禦)方」，指王命令抵禦方國。

　　金文「令」亦用作動詞，指命令。乍冊睘卣：「王姜令乍(作)冊睘安尸(夷)白(伯)」，指王姜命令作冊睘向夷伯問安。又用作名詞，指命令，大保𣪕：「王降征令于大保」，指王對太保下達征戰的命令。另，「命」指任命，曶鼎：「曶，令女(汝)更(賡)乃且(祖)考𤔲卜事。」全句指曶，任命你延續你祖上掌管占卜的事。「令」又從命令引申指賞賜，獻𣪕：「楷白(伯)令氒(厥)臣獻金車」，指楷伯賞賜名叫獻的臣子青銅車。金文有「天令」一詞，即傳世典籍中的「天命」，彔白[冬戈]𣪕蓋：「惠弘天令(命)」，指仁惠、寬大的天命(王輝)。由於生命由天所賜，「令」由賜予引申指生命、壽命。頌鼎：「通彔(祿)、永令(命)」，指完全的福蔭、長久的壽命。另金文「令」可用作「鈴」，成周鈴一：「王成周令(鈴)。」

　　秦簡「令」亦用作本義，指命令，《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡101：「其叚(假)公，叚(假)而有死亡者，亦令其徒、舍人任其叚(假)。」全句指如果借用官有器物，借的人死亡，應命令服役的徒眾或其舍人負責。又「令」可用作官名，《睡虎地秦簡．封診式》簡24：「即令令史某齒牛，牛六歲矣」，指當即命令令史某檢查牛的牙齒，牛已經六歲了。

　　傳世古籍中「令」從命令引申有使、讓的意思，《廣雅．釋詁一》：「令，使也。」《戰國策．趙策一》：「故貴為列侯者，不令在相位。」又「令」有美好的意思，《爾雅．釋詁上》：「令，善也。」《詩．大雅．卷阿》：「如圭如璋，令聞令望。」鄭玄箋：「令，善也。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文全字意會在上位者張口（亼）向跪坐之下人（卩）發施號令，本義是命令。

Ideographic: A person kneeling before a master 人
  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 人 [ rén ] man, person; people
①上级对下级的指示：命令。法令。朝(zh乷)令夕改。
②古代官名：县令。令尹。尚书令。
③使，使得：令人兴奋。
④时节：时令。节令。
⑤美好，善：令名。令辰。令闻(好名声)。
⑥敬辞，用于对方的亲属或有关系的人：令尊。令堂。令岳。令郎。令爱。
⑦短的词调(diào)，散曲中不成套的曲(多用于词调、曲调名)：小令。如梦令。
①(令狐)ａ．古地名，在今山西省临猗县一带；b．复姓。
令狐 [ líng hú ]: old place name (in modern Linyi county 临猗县 , Shanxi); two-character surname Linghu
令狐德棻 [ líng hú dé fēn ]: Linghu Defen (583-666), Tang dynasty historian, compiler of History of Zhou of the Northern dynasties 周书
①量词，印刷用的原张平版纸五百张为一令。

指令(しれい): orders, instructions, directive
仮令(たとえ): example, even if, if, though, although
命令(めいれい): order, command, decree, directive, (software) instruction

甲金文從「 亼 」從「 卩 」，「 亼 」象「 口 」之倒置形，「 卩 」象跪坐之人形。全字意會張口（亼）向跪坐之下人（卩）發施號令，本義是命令。《說文》：「令，發號也。从亼、卪。」「 令 」、「 命 」古本一字，後分化為二字，參見「 命 」。 甲骨文「 令 」用作動詞，指命令。《合集》14295：「今一月，帝令雨。」《合集》20451：「王令御(禦)方」，指王命令抵禦方國。 金文「 令 」亦用作動詞，指命令。乍冊睘卣：「王姜令乍(作)冊睘安尸(夷)白(伯)」，指王姜命令作冊睘向夷伯問安。又用作名詞，指命令，大保𣪕：「王降征令于大保」，指王對太保下達征戰的命令。另，「 命 」指任命，曶鼎：「曶，令女(汝)更(賡)乃且(祖)考𤔲卜事。」全句指曶，任命你延續你祖上掌管占卜的事。「 令 」又從命令引申指賞賜，獻𣪕：「楷白(伯)令氒(厥)臣獻金車」，指楷伯賞賜名叫獻的臣子青銅車。金文有「天令」一詞，即傳世典籍中的「天命」，彔白[冬戈]𣪕蓋：「惠弘天令(命)」，指仁惠、寬大的天命(王輝)。由於生命由天所賜，「 令 」由賜予引申指生命、壽命。頌鼎：「通彔(祿)、永令(命)」，指完全的福蔭、長久的壽命。另金文「 令 」可用作「 鈴 」，成周鈴一：「王成周令(鈴)。」 秦簡「 令 」亦用作本義，指命令，《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡101：「其叚(假)公，叚(假)而有死亡者，亦令其徒、舍人任其叚(假)。」全句指如果借用官有器物，借的人死亡，應命令服役的徒眾或其舍人負責。又「 令 」可用作官名，《睡虎地秦簡．封診式》簡24：「即令令史某齒牛，牛六歲矣」，指當即命令令史某檢查牛的牙齒，牛已經六歲了。 傳世古籍中「 令 」從命令引申有使、讓的意思，《廣雅．釋詁一》：「令，使也。」《戰國策．趙策一》：「故貴為列侯者，不令在相位。」又「 令 」有美好的意思，《爾雅．釋詁上》：「令，善也。」《詩．大雅．卷阿》：「如圭如璋，令聞令望。」鄭玄箋：「令，善也。」

Quanzi means to open your mouth (亼) to give orders to the kneeling people (Jie), the original meaning is command. "Said Wen": "Ling, issue number. From Qian and Xian." "Compilation" 14295: "This January, the emperor will rain." "Compilation" 20451: "Wang Lingyu (Royal) Fang", refers to the king's order to resist Fang. Zha Cai Shuai: "Wang Jiang Ling Zha (made) Suai An corpse (Yi) Bai (Bo)", referring to Wang Jiang's order to write Suai to send greetings to Bo Yi. In addition, " Ming" refers to appointment, Chu Ding: "Yu, let the woman (ru) change (赓) Naiqi (ancestor) to test the divination." The whole sentence refers to the divination, appoint you to continue your ancestor in charge of divination. " Ling" also extended from the order to refer to rewards, offering: "Kai Bai (Bo) Ling 氒 (Jue) Chen offers the golden cart", refers to Kai Bo rewarded the courtier's bronze cart named Xian. There is the word "Tian Ling" in the bronze inscriptions, which is the "mandatory of heaven" in the handed down classics, and white [冬戈] 𣪕 Cover: "Huihong Tianling (Ming)" refers to the benevolent and generous destiny (Wang Hui). Since life is bestowed by heaven, the term " order" by best means life and longevity. Song Ding: "Tong Yi (Lu), Yong Ling (Ming)" refers to complete blessing and long life. In addition, the inscription " Ling" can be used as a " bell" to make Zhou Lingyi: "Wang Cheng Zhou Ling (Ling)." " Ling" in Qin bamboo slips is also used as the original meaning, referring to commands, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. "The Eighteen Kinds of Qin Law" Jian 101: "The person who is dead (fake), and who is dead will also make his disciples and sheren let him (fake)." The full sentence refers to the use of official artifacts, If the borrower dies, the serving disciples or their dead should be ordered to be responsible. Also " Ling" can be used as official name, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. "Closed Diagnosis Style" Jan. 24: "Ling Shi a certain tooth cow, the cow is six years old," which means that Ling Shi was immediately ordered to check the cow's teeth. The cow was six years old. In the handed down ancient books, " Ling" means envoy and letting go from command, "Guang Ya. Shi Gu Yi: "Ling, Shi Ye." "Warring States Policy. "Zhao Ceyi": "Therefore, you are the lords, do not let you in the aspect." And " order" has a beautiful meaning, "Erya. "Explanation on the Interpretation": "Ling, good also." "Poetry. Daya. "Volume A": "Like Guiruzhang, let the news make Wang." Zheng Xuanjian: "Ling, good."

令字的基本解释

令
líng
〔令狐〕ａ．古地名，在今山西省临猗县一带；ｂ．复姓。

令
lǐng
量词，印刷用的原张平版纸五百张为一令。

令
lìng
上级对下级的指示：命令。法令。朝（zh乷 ）令夕改。
古代官名：县令。令尹。尚书令。
使，使得：令人兴奋。
时节：时令。节令。
美好，善：令名。令辰。令闻（好名声）。
敬辞，用于对方的亲属或有关系的人：令尊。令堂。令岳。令郎。令爱。
短的词调（di刼 ），散曲中不成套的曲（多用于词调、曲调名）：小令。如梦令。

令字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lìng］
［《廣韻》力政切，去勁，來。］
(1)谓发出命令让人执行。
(2)命令；法令。
(3)特指皇后、太子或诸王的命令，以别于皇帝的诏命。
(4)命名。
(5)官名。秦汉时大县的行政长官。
(6)官名。历代中央最高机关及某些下属机关的主官。如尚书令、中书令，太子家令、掖庭令、太乐令等。
(7)指受任为县令。
(8)善；美好。
(9)敬辞。多用于称对方的家属或亲属。如令堂、令妹、令嫒等。
(10)古代按十二个月分别记载所施行的政令，谓之月令。后因以指时令，节令。
(11)指酒令。
(12)词调的一类。亦称小令或令曲。其特点一般是乐调短，字数少。如《十六字令》，十六字；《如梦令》，三十三字。但也有少数乐调较长、字数较多的，如《六幺令》，九十六字。北曲的散曲中也有令，实际上等于一首单调的词，但演唱时句中可适当加入衬字。如叨叨令、转调淘金令等。参见“小令”。
[②]［lìng］
［《廣韻》吕貞切，平清，來。］
(1)使。
(2)连词。假如，如果。
[③]［líng］

令字的英文翻译

◎ 令
order, command, cause, drinking game, ream, season, your

令字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　令； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页93第12
【集韻】【正韻】?力正切，零去聲。律也，法也，告戒也。【書·囧命】發號施令，罔有不臧。【禮·月令】命相布德和令。【周禮·秋官】士師掌士之八成，四曰犯邦令，五月撟邦令。　又三令。【前漢·宣帝紀】令有先後，有令甲，令乙，令丙。　又縣令。漢法，縣萬戸以上爲令，以下爲長。　又時令，月令，所以紀十二月之政。　又善也。【詩·大雅】令聞令望。【左傳·成十年】忠爲令德，非其人猶不可，况不令乎。　又姓。　又【集韻】郞丁切【正韻】離呈切，?音零。厮役曰使令。　又丁令，地名。見【前漢·張湯傳】。或作丁零。又令狐，亦地名。　又令狐，複姓。　又【詩·齊風】盧令令。【註】盧，田犬。令令，犬頜下環聲。　又與鴒通。【詩·小雅】脊令在原，兄弟急難，卽鶺鴒鳥。　又令適，甓也。與瓴甋同。　又【集韻】郞定切，音笭。令支，縣名。在遼西。　又【廣韻】力延切【集韻】陵延切，?音連。亦縣名。【前漢·地理志】金城郡有令居縣。　又【集韻】盧景切，音領。官署之長。　又叶呂張切，音良。【韓愈·谿堂詩】凡公

令字的起名意思

：本义为发布命令。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lìng］
["Guangyun" force politics, go for it, come. ]
(1) It means that an order is issued to be executed.
(2) Order; decree.
(3) Specifically refers to the order of the queen, prince, or kings, as distinguished from the edicts of the emperor.
(4) Naming.
(5) Official name. The chief executive of a county in the Qin and Han dynasties.
(6) Official name. The chief officials of the highest central organs and certain subordinate organs in the past dynasties. Such as Shang Shu Ling, Zhong Shu Ling, Prince Jia Ling, Ye Ting Ling, Tai Le Ling and so on.
(7) Refers to being appointed as a county magistrate.
(8) Good; good.
(9) Respect. Mostly used to refer to each other's family or relatives. Such as Lingtang, Lingmei, Lingmei and so on.
(10) In ancient times, the government decrees were recorded separately in twelve months, called monthly decrees. Later, because of the seasons and seasons.
(11) The order of wine.
(12) A category of tones. Also known as Xiaoling or Lingqu. Its characteristics are generally short musical tune and few words. Such as "Sixteen-character Order", sixteen characters; "Like a Dream Order", thirty-three characters. However, there are also a few with longer tunes and more words, such as "Liu Yao Ling", which has 96 words. There is also a command in the Sanqu of the Northern Songs, which is actually a monotonous word, but it is appropriate to add a supplementary word to the sentence when singing. Such as talk about orders, transfer gold rush orders and so on. See "Small Order".
[②]［lìng］
["Guangyun" Lu Zhenqie, Pingqing, come. ]
(1) Make.
(2) Conjunctions. If, if.
[③]［líng］

Name meaning
: The original meaning is to issue an order.
令
lìng
在一个大屋顶下,一个人跪
坐着,正在向人们发布命令。
*今”和“命”词义相近,但“今”还
有“使”的意思,如“臣能令君胜”
(我能使您胜)。
A a (Ar 合令 f
делать
Под большой крышей на коленях сидел мужчина и отдавал приказы людям.
«Цзинь» и «Мин» имеют схожие значения, но «Цзинь» также имеет значение «ши», например, «министр может заставить короля победить» (я могу заставить тебя победить).
A a (Ar комбинированный порядок f
lìng, lǐng, líng
I lìng сущ.
1) приказ, предписание, указание; указ, декрет, закон; директива; наставление
军令 военный приказ
令到郎覆 ответить немедленно по получении настоящего приказа
2) уст. начальник приказа, глава учреждения; ответственный чиновник
县令 уездный начальник
守令 начальник области
3) время года, сезон
冬令 зима
预备应节当令的货品 заготовить товары к наступающему празднику и предстоящему сезону
4) застольный приказ (задача на пиру ― штраф налагается чаркой вина)
何不行个令大家欢饮 почему бы не дать застольный приказ, чтобы все с удовольствием выпили?
5) муз. лин (классическая мелодия)
6) лит. малая форма "цы" (词)
7) театр жезл; верительная бирка, удостоверяющая право посланного передать устный приказ начальника
II счётное слово
1) lǐng (англ. ream) стопа бумаги (для печатной машины, 500 листов)
2) lìng (сокр. вм. 令克, англ. link) линк (мера длины, равная 20 см)
III lìng гл.
1) приказывать, предписывать; обязывать
令下级切实执行… офиц. приказать нижестоящим органам принять изложенное к неуклонному исполнению
2) заставлять, вынуждать; давать возможность; служебный глагол побуждения
令人不安 вызывать беспокойство
令人生疑 возбуждать подозрения
令人作呕 внушать отвращение
臣能令君胜 «я дам Вам, государь, возможность победить; я обеспечу Вам победу»
3) служебный глагол в условно-уступительных оборотах: допускать, допустить даже, что...; пусть даже
幸值丰年, 令凶年, 将不堪矣 к счастью, случился урожайный год; будь то (случись) голодный год, всем пришлось бы туго
4) пусть
令x=1 пусть x = 1
IV lìng прил.
хороший, прекрасный, добрый; вежл. Ваш
不令臣 плохой подданный, дурной министр
令誉 добрая слава, хорошая репутация
令仆 Ваш слуга
令郎 Ваш сын
V собств.
1) lìng, líng Лин (фамилия)
2) líng см. 令狐
Radicals: 令  (orders)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you know the radical meaning order you know the kanji meaning order as well!
Here's an order: study your radicals.
Reading Mnemonic
Your orders are to get a ray (れい) gun.
Imagine an authority figure giving you this order as an official order. Ray guns don't really exist, so you think it's a pretty strange order.
Hint: when you see the orders radical, the reading will often be れい. The mnemonic will likely involve orders to get a ray gun of some kind.
